lender.name: Sally & Hailey
lender.loan_because: We want to share...

lender.name: Mancusi-Wells Family
lender.loan_because: it's our way to say thank you to everyone who has ever helped us.

lender.name: Dee
lender.loan_because: no man is an island

lender.name: Rice Family
lender.loan_because: we want to help other people to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: The father works for a plastic packaging company in business development. The mother works as an office manager. Both kids go to school.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do to help entrepreneurs around the world. A lot of people are not as fortunate as we are here in the United States and this is one of my ways to help.
lender.occupational_info: I sell goods and services on the internet.

lender.name: Amie & Ben
lender.loan_because: we're lucky we can.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I am woman, I own my own business, I am blessed to live in a country that allows me to do this, others are not so fortunate, if I can help just one woman succeed, one woman feed her family, one woman feel good about herself, I am blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I own a bookkeeping service that caters to small businesses.

lender.name: Suleiman
lender.loan_because: I know we should share what we have!
lender.occupational_info: I am a student and work as voluntary Horn of Africa People`s Aid (HAPA) is a voluntary non profitable organisation established in 2006

lender.name: ElkoJohn
lender.loan_because: it's makes for a better world; i am a Vietnam veteran and have always wanted to make amends.
lender.occupational_info: I teach GED (high school equivalency) to prison inmates. I have learned that if I help others, life gets a little better for everyone.

lender.name: nikki
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Sophie
lender.loan_because: to help others who do not have what I have
lender.occupational_info: I am a preschooler who loves to dance, sing and play outside

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I was a struggling single mother and someone gave me a chance. That leg up has meant the world to me and my daughter who is now pursuing post-graduate studies in University. Without this chance this would not have been possible.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the Supply Chain Major Projects office for a large Canadian corporation. Our division is responsible for large construction projects and systems implementation. Part of my job is to ensure that the projects come in on time and on budget.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 13 year old children French.

lender.name: Tiffani
lender.loan_because: Life has been good to me - and it affords me the ability to provide assistance to others where I can.

lender.name: Alvar
lender.loan_because: I like to give tools for fishing, not a fish.
lender.occupational_info: I am an investor. I try to invest in good companies. When everything goes well, the company's share price starts to rise. So I can sell my shares with much better price and get some profit.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: My daughter Allison and I lend together. We have a strong committment to empowerment. We believe taht as much is given much is required.
lender.occupational_info: Steve is CEO of a trade association in Washington DC. Are is banking and financial services. Allison is social worker by profession. She is currently program admininstrator for agency of US government.

lender.name: Dustin
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves..it is the way forward for empowerment and sustainable development.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I study international relations and over the course of my degree I've come to realise that we all need to lend a helping hand.

lender.name: Warren
lender.loan_because: my dog tells me to.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I believe in the Kiva model.
lender.occupational_info: Contact Center Management

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: Everyone should equal chances on everything.
lender.occupational_info: A Student, In my 8th year of education.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: It feels good!
lender.occupational_info: I drive ships.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: why not?!

lender.name: CEC
lender.loan_because: If a small amount of up front money is all that is stalling a successful business, that is a problem I can help resolve.
lender.occupational_info: I help organizations protect their systems and information from common user mistakes, unauthorized access, and malicious software.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I want to increase the flow of my prosperity to others in the world.

lender.name: Cathie D
lender.loan_because: I have been a business woman all my life. I have been fortunate to have people help me along the way. Everyone deserves a chance to make their lives better, and I appreciate the opportunity to share what I can to help.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: In our society, we do not realize how good we have it. We think having to wait for the second taxi is a huge inconvenience... when in reality... we are truly blessed. If we can help make the life of someone in a less fortunate country better.... we should.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a small commercial print shop as well as doing a little freelance graphic design and web design for friends.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home to take care of my baby and earn money by helping to make websites and teaching others to make websites

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I have been in a position where I have needed help. And now I am in a position where I can give help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach my children to think independently and to strive to be the best they can be.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: it helps others achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Advocacy

lender.name: Doug & Corinne
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.occupation: Student at west wood, high school

lender.name: Zona Marie
lender.loan_because: I'm paying forward for the kindness my friends have shown me through contributing to my wedding wish.
lender.occupational_info: I've worked as a television producer/director for seven years. Now I'm starting life afresh in a new home country, blessed with a new job, and married to a wonderful man.

lender.name: Mary-Anne
lender.loan_because: I admire the ingenuity and energy of entrepreneurs and am happy to be able to help people get their businesses going.

lender.name: vythimaichi
lender.loan_because: I want open a small post office.
lender.occupational_info: everybody can come to make phone call and buy prepaid card, send mail...

lender.occupational_info: A positive attitude may not solve all of your problems, but it sure will piss off enough people to make it worth while!

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I've seen what a loan can do!

lender.name: Terri & Lawson
lender.loan_because: This seems like a wonderful way to help eradicate poverty and spread the love. It can't hurt!
lender.occupational_info: I program and maintain telephone systems for a major wireless carrier in the U.S. Lawson is a retired over the road truck-driver.

lender.name: Shweta Katyal
lender.loan_because: My small contribution to society.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who may otherwise not have an opportunity to realize their dreams. I'm not rich, but microfinancing allows me to help.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to help hardworking people improve their lives.

lender.name: Cu Nguyen
lender.loan_because: I believe these remarkable people can make a big differences in their life, if they were given a chance.

lender.name: Suzanne & Apollo
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to improve their own life
lender.occupational_info: Helping improve the work life of people who work in spaces I design

lender.name: Gary

lender.name: Tony & Maura

lender.occupational_info: I help ensure the financial success of the electric utility I work for.

lender.name: Christine C.
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to really make a difference for people who are working hard to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I write movies that air on television

lender.name: pd.
lender.loan_because: It is in sync with my values. If I didn't give, I would not be living with integrity. Integrity is living what you believe.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Operations Manager at Burt Associates, Incorporated and I am the head Pastor of the Tapestry Vineyard Church.

if I can spare the money, there's no reason I shouldn't. There's no reason anyone shouldn't.

lender.name: Kim

lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell the best made chocolate in the world. I love finding them, telling their story, and showing them off to the world. The story of chocolate travels the world.

lender.name: Bobby Frisdiandy

lender.loan_because: I believe it is possible for everyone to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I run a website where I publish my writing and where my book is available as a free download.

lender.name: Kyle & Rebecca
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful thing to help those who are working to better their own circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a classical music performer.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I know it can be difficult to begin a business and sometimes all is needed is a small loan and encouragement. I hope I can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: Owner of holiday accommodation on a rural property 15 minutes from the beach. I get to meet a lot of different people from all over the world as well as other parts of Australia as they nholiday in this beautiful part of our country.

lender.name: sdfsdf
lender.loan_because: school
lender.occupational_info: teaching

lender.name: Liliana
lender.loan_because: This is a vey good idea!
lender.occupational_info: I work in forensic toxicology. Drugs of abuse and poisonings.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I loan because it is a good way to help connect with individuals around the world and a way to help them promote their own enterprises in a direct way in which Iotherwise would not be able to.
lender.occupational_info: Ex-pat living and working in London

lender.name: Emmanuel
lender.loan_because: I am a boy in Acca, Ghana - West Africa. I stays alone with my mother. Since the death of my dad I have not been able to solve any monetery matter eg. Bills, Fees, Levis.etc..... And this is hapening because my mother is also not employed. So please I need a loan to my mother for her to work with that money so that I may also get payed to my bills and the rest. Because this has been an huge situation unto us. Please I call the name of the LIVING GOD that whosoever helps me, the GOD ALMIGHTY's Hand will shine on that person and also HE will protect that person forever and ever. For blessings be your portion the one who reads this and feels mercy and piety for me..May the Great God Almighty also have mercy upon you.... After all, a Big Thanks to the GOD Our FATHER and HIS Son JESUS Christ. Amen..... 1 John 2:15-17 Romans 6:23 John 3:1downwds Galatians5:22-23
lender.occupational_info: In GOD I Trust... and my work is almost Universal..... Though I am a Student....

lender.name: mags
lender.loan_because: we are all in this together.

lender.name: Alisha
lender.loan_because: My uncle David gave me a certificate to loan to different people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Iam a 6th grade student

lender.name: Olivier
lender.loan_because: Money is not well distributed on our very small planet. Let us always remember that the people we give to also have a lot of things to bring to us, to the artificial civilizations we have built that are cut off from their roots and that are staggering today.

lender.name: AVID--2010
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in other peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: We are students in the 2010 AVID class at Highland High School in Gilbert, AZ.

lender.name: jervis
lender.loan_because: i'm planning to start a school for kids on our neighborhood.
lender.occupational_info: I study and work at the same time. it is hard for me because i really want to help these kids.

lender.name: oluseye
lender.loan_because: i want to expand my busineess.
lender.occupational_info: my business is vulnerable because i deals with property agency

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: santiago
lender.loan_because: I love people
lender.occupational_info: The best in the world

lender.name: Apt's Econ Class
lender.loan_because:
We want to help out ... we had fun raising the money and wanted it to go to a worthy cause.
A wise man should have money in his head, but not in his heart. --Jonathan Swift (1667 - 1745)
lender.occupational_info: We are high school economics students in a small New Hampshire city.

lender.name: Esa
lender.loan_because: Creating opportunities.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed and want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am in Customer Service, I focus on giving my customers a great shopping experience so that they will continue to shop at my store.

lender.name: LocoPups
lender.loan_because: I can not imagined what its like not have food on the table to feed hungry children that are dying everyday. Also because I know I can make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: it is a pleasure to help others improve their lives through their enterprise

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: It feels good.

lender.name: Daniel & Karen
lender.loan_because: we want to make a difference in peoples lives.

lender.name: Katja
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a chance to start or improve their own businesses. I believe in people and their enthusiasm. Kiva means "fun" in Finnish, and I think this is a fun way to make a serious difference.
lender.occupational_info: I study the social aspects of internet in organisational setting: how it can improve people's chance to make difference and express their ideas in big companies. It's also all about connecting people with other people.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I've been lucky in life and want Kiva to be one of the ways I give back.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company keep accurate financial records for our investors.

lender.name: Brint, Terry and Noah
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference.

lender.name: Kendrick
lender.loan_because: "In this world it is not what we take up, but what we give up, that makes us rich." I just want to help.

lender.name: Ingunn
lender.loan_because: It could make a difference

lender.name: Schmutzie
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer, designer, and photographer.

lender.name: Bruce James
lender.loan_because: I am a self-employed businessperson and I look forward to helping others start and or expand their business endeavors.
lender.occupational_info: Photographer

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: my life has been blessed with opportunities and with support from others. I want to pass on what I have to others who need some support to realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people with different types of disabilities to learn how to make their homes more usable for them. Some of my focus is on homebuilders to help them understand what is needed.

lender.name: Bhupesh
lender.loan_because: there is no purpose in life if we only help ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a businessman focused on providing marketing, sales, and web strategy advice to small and medium sized companies.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.occupational_info: Uh...I do psycholinguistic research, so I study how people process language.

lender.name: Francine
lender.loan_because: Love and help are NECESSARY
lender.occupational_info: Education

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: Personnaly I've never felt comfortable giving to a large charitable organization. It may seem selfish but I take greater satisfaction in directly contributing to a person or a families success.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an organization that creates employment opportunities for people who are blind all over the United States.

lender.name: Zosimo
lender.loan_because: There are to many poor people around the world that only need a little "push" to have the opportunity of a better life. If we can help, why not do it ?
lender.occupational_info: Hard working person....that is all people need to do (some of them with some help from the others) !

lender.name: Bryan and Jocelyn
lender.loan_because: Helping people and communities around the world one loan at a time
lender.occupational_info: Jocelyn is working while I am going back to school.

lender.name: keri and andy
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Giovanni 51
lender.loan_because: I believe in a better world where everyone can do something in order to make the other's life better . We have to remember more often that , WE ARE THE OTHERS AS WELL .
lender.occupational_info: My work is hard and interesting . Finally a job .

lender.name: Fitzloy family
lender.loan_because: We want the world to be a fairer place
lender.occupational_info: We have four children, three in school and one not started school yet, and both parents run a small business

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I Can

lender.name: Totally
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate, and love to give back. I love everyone in the world, we should share with others.
lender.occupational_info: I write software for computers. I believe this makes people both happy and frustrated, though we try our best.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I believe in enabling people to succeed. Instead of pitying a person, we should find opportunities to enable someone to move beyond their present condition.
lender.occupational_info: I was in the military for a few years, and now I'm working to put myself through school.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to succeed!

lender.name: Shawn & Tina
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate in my life and would like to share that with others.

lender.name: Jiggee Jon
lender.loan_because: Having been blessed for a better part of my life, its time to give back to those who need it most...
lender.occupational_info: I have the privilege of being self-employed and totally love what I do. i am indeed blessed!

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I don't have a lot to give, but if everyone just gave a little things would be much better
lender.occupational_info: I make sure people sign up for health benefits when they are ready. I also spend a lot of time filling out government paperwork for our company. I work at a beautiful 35 acre sculpture garden.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: My friend introduced me to this program. I think it is an exciting way to help other people and families.
lender.occupational_info: I help low-income families in my community gain access to resources such as housing, medical assistance and other resources.

lender.name: Noam
lender.loan_because: I believe in "Gemilut Chasadim" and "Tzedaka", since I am growing up in a jewish home.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at junior high.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I believe the best way to ensure future prosperity is by providing people with opportunities to proactively improve their situation in life. Kiva is a step in the right direction.
lender.occupational_info: I develop programs to help organizations improve their public affairs departments.

lender.name: ronzo
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have chickens
lender.occupational_info: I bring lights to homes

lender.name: Vlada
lender.loan_because: we are all connected.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to students grades 9-12.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.occupation: housing coordinator for an English language school

lender.name: LTE
lender.loan_because: Its a cheap way of making a massive difference to peoples' lives in less affluent countries.
lender.occupational_info: I loan money to big companies.

lender.name: Jacquelyn
lender.loan_because: this is the way i reach out to the world.
lender.occupational_info: Multi-tasking, busy and always exhausted....but i love my job...

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate in my life. I have not got an abundance in earthly wealth but I have enough to provide for my little girl and my wonderful husband, I have a happy home and a healthy environment for my little girl to grow up in. I know that there are many many people that are not as fortunate as I am. I hope that the little I am able to offer can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the Quality Department in a NHP/Health Food manufacturing plant. I oversee the Quality Assurance, Quality Control and the Technical Lab. I try to ensure that the products leaving our plant is safe and effective and meet all regulatory standards.

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: My brother introduced me to this great idea!

lender.name: Simone
lender.loan_because: I always appreciate when people have helped me in my life, and I would like to extend the gesture to others as well.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an artist first of all....I love to travel, and I also produce my own travel podcast videos....

lender.name: Naphtalia
lender.loan_because: it helps people to improve their lives and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a storyteller, entertainer, puppeteer and magician.

lender.name: Ellie
lender.loan_because: Generosity is not giving me that which I need more than you do, but it is giving me that which you need more than I do. ~Kahlil Gibran
lender.occupational_info: I nap most of the day, take walks to the park, and pretend to be a big bad ferocous dog when sketchy people are outside our home because we live in a rough neighborhood. I also tattle-tale on the cat.

lender.name: Ozzi
lender.loan_because: It's a great feeling to help someone that want's to help themselves.

lender.name: Tullio
lender.loan_because: I believe in fighting poverty through micro-credit, and a small amount for me can change the life of many people

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: "I've never been able to understand the seriousness of it all, the seriousness of pride. People talk, act, live as if they're never going to die. And what do they leave behind? Nothing. Nothing but a mask. "

lender.name: Yvonne&Roman
lender.loan_because: I believe that eveybody deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: we are entrepreneurs and we work in the wine business

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I like to support free enterprise and support honest hard working people if I can help.
lender.occupational_info: Building computer programs that allow multiple people to interact with the same set of customers, products and transactions providing more efficient and timely customer service.

lender.name: Madeleine Akerlund
lender.loan_because: It seems to be a great way to help people build better lives for themselves and their families. It does take a village....

lender.name: Helene
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that just happened to be born in a different country or on a different continent and didn't get the same opportunities I got.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my two sons: a toddler and a baby.

lender.name: Marika
lender.loan_because: I want to help to empower people and make them more in control of their own lifes.
lender.occupational_info: I work with small scale sustainable sanitation, which means that I plan and design on-site sanitation systems for people who are not connected to centralised sewage and wastewater treatment plants.

lender.name: Rachelle
lender.loan_because:
well i haven't yet... but am going to when i get paid because...
"our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our light, not our darkness, that most frightens us."
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small company that teaches and coaches people who own businesses how market their products/ services.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I have a passion for helping others!

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: it's a more realistic and long term sustainable way to help people in developing countries.

lender.name: Jamin and Yolanda
lender.loan_because: we want to contribute to the change that we hope to see in this world.

lender.name: Aidan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who have dreams and who work hard
lender.occupational_info: I try to preach the Gospel of Jesus Christ

lender.name: Lesley
lender.loan_because: It feels great to give someone a chance to improve their lives!!!

lender.name: Kylie
lender.loan_because: I want to enable others to help themselves.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a wonderful idea and opportunities make the world go 'round.
lender.occupational_info: I spend time thinking about brains and health :)

lender.name: Krista Callen
lender.loan_because: Sometimes you just need someone to have a little faith in you!

lender.name: JacMak
lender.loan_because: I want my children to realize there is more to this world than their immediate surroundings. Part of each loan we give comes from their own money after they have researched the options.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mom and a classroom teacher.

lender.name: Indigo
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I am an elementary student and my school is hard and challenging.

lender.name: The Trevisans
lender.loan_because: We are so fortunate to have been born into a situation in which we are safe and comfortable. I hope that more people in the world may experience the sense of security, which we too often take for granted, that comes from knowing that they can provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: perpetual student and sometimes educator

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I have more than enough in my life and feel an urge to help make other people's lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I answer phones. I am responsible for visitors getting to their meeting points.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I feel lucky to have been born into a middle class family in America with plenty of opportunities and I love the idea of being able to extend those opportunities to others.

lender.name: Kathy and Roy
lender.occupation: Kathy is RN, Roy is in IS
lender.loan_because: We have been very fortunate in our lives; we feel it is right to help others find their fortunes.
lender.occupational_info: Kathy is a nurse who spends her day on the phone talking to people with heart problems; Roy manages people in a large computer department at a Childrens Hospital.

lender.name: janet
lender.loan_because: It is a wonderful feeling every month when my repayments come in & I get to make more loans.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I also have received help along the way and it has made a huge difference in my life. It has gotten me to where I always wanted to be...at the pointy end of the airplane. I hope to pass along what good tidings I have been fortunate enough to have received.
lender.occupational_info: I increase people's spiritual lives. People are praying for their dear lives....Ha!!!

lender.name: Euvon
lender.loan_because: I know that we are all connected in the world. we have a responsibility to take care of each other.
lender.occupational_info: I help people that have defaulted on their credit card loans to the bank re-establish credit. I help them to get back on track.

lender.name: Gemmill Family
lender.loan_because: We care and it feels good.

lender.name: Scarlett Lizzie Emporium

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: indecisions they left me a long time ago and now i know that a mad mans poison is another mans food
lender.occupational_info: i am a part time hedonist and a part time dadaist. neither pays well, but i enjoy the benefits.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: We all need a little help sometimes.

lender.name: Edward Diaram Gary...

lender.occupational_info:
With each passing day, I am drawing closer to religious life, specifically Franciscan. My email is edgaram@hotmail.com if you ever wish to contact me.
âMy grace is sufficient for you, for power is made perfect in weakness.â So, I will boast all the more gladly of my weaknesses, so that the power of Christ may dwell in me. Therefore I am content with weaknesses, insults, hardships, persecutions, and calamities for the sake of Christ; for whenever I am weak, then I am strong. -2 Corinthians 12:9-10

lender.name: Dave & Jess
lender.loan_because: It is well with those who deal generously and lend, who conduct their affairs with justice. Psalm 112

lender.loan_because: Everyone should be given a chance

lender.name: Alvin
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their goals and dreams.

lender.name: Graeme
lender.loan_because: I have met people who have great ideas to pull themselves out of poverty and cant explore them as they earn less than $1 per day. I always believed that they held the key to success and want to help make it possible.
lender.occupational_info: Doing as little as possible to achieve as much as possible

lender.name: Owen
lender.loan_because: I have done well in life, and now want to give back to ensure that anyone, anywhere in the world, can be able to achieve their dreams and get ahead.

lender.name: Carrie

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others help themselves.

lender.name: Paulette
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone that is trying to do something productive rather than just give up.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.occupation: Keller Williams Ottawa Real Estate Agent
lender.loan_because: Microfinancing has been proven to be the best way to extend a helping hand. The improved conditions are sustained through the following generations and once people get a foothold on a decent life, we all will ultimately benefit. So, you see, it's an entirely selfish move on my part.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an ordinary person who is grateful for the opportunity to help out some extraordinary people.

lender.name: Rayna
lender.loan_because: It is very hard to get ahead without some help from others. People have helped me. I had to borrow money in order to go to school. Now I can repay that money and with my new career I can help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a social worker, which means that I listen to other people as they tell me their stories and struggles, and I try to help them feel better about themselves and their ability to make a life they want.

lender.name: Jamie and John
lender.loan_because: We appreciate the opportunity to give some assistance to those trying to improve their lives.

lender.name: Sudhakar
lender.loan_because: "Service to Man is Service to God" - Swami
lender.occupational_info: Implement financial systems and applications

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are trying to help themselves.

lender.name: Chantal
lender.loan_because: Everyone should be able to pursue what makes them happy

lender.name: Marja
lender.loan_because: These loans help women to help themselves and make them feel proud of themselves. I lend to women in particular because a loan to a woman is a loan to an entire family.
lender.occupational_info:
In spring 2009 me and my husband Frans have successfully trained NLP, Non-Violent Communication and Family Constellations in KABUL -Afghanistan as peacebuilding.
The trainings were for 2 different groups: * 12 illiterate widows and their 42 children who live in a shelter. They have now more selfesteem and mre problemsolving qualities. * A train-the-trainer training was for 18 highly educated and dedicated women and men of the Afghan Womens Network.

lender.name: Jaime
lender.loan_because: I owe it back to all those who helped me through life up to this point! We ALL deserve a chance at success:)
lender.occupational_info: I am first of all a mother,and secondly photographer:)

lender.name: Kristopher
lender.loan_because: I've been given much.

lender.name: Andrew

lender.name: EFRAT

lender.name: Jerry and Bonnie
lender.loan_because: ...it's the RIGHT THING to do. We have been privileged to travel to many parts of the world and we have seen how difficult life is in many places. We are happy to help support those who are trying to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: Even though we choose to divide the earth into parts. The earth doesn't know this. We can only be Earthlings in the end. This means everyone is a member of my community. We help people in our communities.
lender.occupational_info: It is an honor to be a partner to help a family,a person who deserves the chance to help their family and community. Thank you for the chance to be part of this wonderful brotherhood and sister hood of Planet Earth.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I like to help those who help themselves.

lender.name: Doug Kyle
lender.loan_because:
It's important to help others in whatever ways I can and I believe that the empowering them to help themselves is far more powerful than providing a handout.
If I am not for myself, who will be for me? If I am not for others, what am I? If not now, when?
lender.occupational_info: I'm a project management consultant who specialized in IT solutions and business process re-engineering. My primary areas of experience are utilities, oil & gas and construction, with some experience in education and government.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I believe each one of us can make a huge impact in the world, if each of us just starts doing one little thing at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I work from home on my computar, in the stock market. I buy and sell stocks.

lender.name: FurBags
lender.loan_because: a hand up beats a handout.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: I live better than 90% of the world population. I have a great life, great parents and a successful career. It is important to help others that don't have such strong support systems. Without grass root support and help, others won't get the chance to succeed. By helping others, we help everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pastry chef at a 5 diamond resort--bake cakes, cookies and pies and make the donuts too: )

lender.name: Florence&Husband
lender.loan_because: my husband and i have a charitable organization going on in Ghana, West Africa. As we write to you, there is a boy here who has to undergo a surgery because he has a hole in heart. We plead with you to please help us out with the very little you can so as to make it possible for him to live a better and pain free life. please forward all donations to us using this mail address florsuman@yahoo.com
lender.occupational_info: Not all were born with the abilities to make things right for themselves. My husband and i took it upon ourselves to cater for those who have a bright futer but cant seem to see the light at the end of the tunnel.
